mapper.insert: insert into t_figures( figure_id, figure_name, birth_date, death_date, description, date_time, city_id, event_id ) values( #{figureId}, #{figureName}, #{birthDate}, #{deathDate}, #{description}, now(), #{cityId}, #{eventId} )
mapper.select: SELECT figure_id, figure_name, birth_date, death_date, description, date_time, is_del, city_id, event_id FROM t_figures WHERE figure_id != 0 AND is_del = 1
SELECT figure_id, figure_name, birth_date, death_date, description, date_time, is_del, city_id, event_id FROM t_figures WHERE figure_id = #{figureId} AND is_del = 1
